institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 5 (Composition of Deliberation Committee)
contents: Article 5 (Composition of the Deliberation Committee) ① The Chairman shall establish the National Human Resources Development Consortium Deliberation Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Deliberation Committee) for deliberation in accordance with Article 9, Paragraph 1 of the Regulations. ② The chairman must form a human resources pool to operate the deliberation committee, and depending on the agenda, the deliberation committee may be formed and operated by up to 15 members from the human resources pool, including the chairperson. ③ The chairman of the deliberation committee shall be the director in charge of the corporation. Revised September 10, 2021, ④ The validity period of registration in the deliberation committee human resources pool shall be 2 years (for ex officio members, the term of office shall be the period of service), but may be extended for only 1 year. Revised September 10, 2021, ⑤ The Chairman may appoint a manager or team leader-level public official from the relevant central administrative agency as an ex officio member of the Deliberation Committee.
